name: 1 page resume + coverletter
description:
Let's update your old resume with a clean, modern, and professional one-page resume & cover letter. 


Made with styles and components that allow you to easily edit and personalise this resume to suit your needs.


Includes:

→ a cover letter

→ a one-page resume template 

→ fully editable Google fonts

→ fully editable colours


Feel free to download it, make a premium-quality resume, and export it to PDF after editing.


A4 Format | Google Fonts | PDF Export
